title: Burning Brigght Star guardian icon? @Riot
body: i took the quiz along time ago and never received it i don't know if thats a bug or....

replies.body:
I also took the quiz during the advertised time but didn't get the icon.

At this point it doesn't matter.  After all it is just a graphic.

I am starting to feel this way about the skins too. =-/  

I use to go to the PAX events for the free skin too.  And participated in the awards Riot got.  Hell got the Corki flying saucer skin that way.  And I am a beta tester so I have King Rammus.

Sadly the rewards just don't seem what they use to be and certainly not for the veteran players.

The star guardian icons were finished distributing a few months ago.  The quiz is still available to be taken, but no rewards are offered for it.  I don't have any news or details on it returning, but bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) to stay up to date.  Let me know if that clears things up!
